üéµ Music Playback

//play

Search and play music from YouTube

//play [song name or URL]
Public

//queue

Show next 10 songs in queue

//queue
Public

//loop

Toggle queue repeat mode

//loop
Public

//shuffle

Randomize queue order

//shuffle
Public

//volume

Adjust playback volume

//volume [0-200]
Public

‚ö†Ô∏è Moderation (Admin Only)

//kick

Remove member from server

//kick @user [reason]
Admin

//ban

Permanently ban member

//ban @user [reason]
Admin

//warn

Warn member (tracked & logged)

//warn @user [reason]
Admin

//mute

Timeout member for 1 hour

//mute @user
Admin

//unmute

Remove timeout

//unmute @user
Admin

//warnings

View member's warning history

//warnings @user
Admin
